# RFAP for Geotechnical Consulting Services

## Notice Details

| Notice Reference | Solicitation # | Publication Date | Tender Closing Date |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| MX-42812007925 | WRO23SO1-80245 | 2023-07-17 | 2023-08-25T14:00:00 |

## Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence (DND) through Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites consulting firms to submit an abbreviated proposal for a Standing Offer (SO) to provide professional geotechnical consulting services. The SO will be effective for a period of three (3) years and has a maximum estimated value of $1,200,000.

## Services

The services required include:

* Project Manager (Hourly Rate)
* Senior Geotechnical Engineer (Hourly Rate)
* Intermediate Geotechnical Engineer (Hourly Rate)
* Junior Geotechnical Engineer (Hourly Rate)
* Field Geotechnical Technologist/Technician (Hourly Rate)
* Total Classification Rate (Hourly Rate)
* Maximum Upset Unit Travel Rates to various locations in Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba (Hourly Rate)

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the established criteria set out in the Request for Abbreviated Proposal (RFAP) document.

## Tender Requirements

* Firms must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
* Proposals must be received by the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.
* Bidding and documents are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

## Procurement Method

The procurement method for this project is competitive and open bidding.

## Trade Agreements

This project is subject to Canada's international trade agreements, including:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this project is Defence Construction Canada (DCC).
